name: Wonder Works Media
overview: Wonder Works Media, Ltd. provides 3D marketing solutions. Its products include StagePod, a large scale temporary displays system suitable for public relations and sponsorship events, product launches, conferences, exhibitions, museums, clubs, and theatrical productions; AdPod, a medium scale 3D advertising pod suitable for customer environments, such as retail outlets, shopping malls, airports, and railway stations; and VisPod, a small scale 3D visual communication pod suitable for point of sale, window and foyer displays, instore events, kiosks, gondola ends, shelf headers, pubs and clubs, public relations, sponsorship events, museums, and visitor attractions. The companyâ€™s 3D systems, effects, and techniques can also be used for applications, such as signage and visual communication systems, exhibition and conference displays, product dispensers and vending machines, virtual sales assistance, and education, training, and simulation systems, as well as entertainment, concerts, and theatrical productions. It offers supporting effects, including holography, lenticular, shadowgrams, and the stratosphere. Its services include a presentation studio, consultancy, brain storming ideas, design and product development, origination and content production, project planning and management, and network management and after sales services. The company is based in London, the United Kingdom.

financial_org.name: Hoodless Brennan & Partners, Venture Funding Division
